thread.title: IQNavigator Forms Alliance with Genesys, Providing New Clouds of Non-Employee Talent to Customers
thread.title_full: IQNavigator Forms Alliance with Genesys, Providing New Clouds of Non-Employee Talent to Customers

author: Victor Chayet
title: IQNavigator Forms Alliance with Genesys, Providing New Clouds of Non-Employee Talent to Customers
text:
IQNavigator, the leading, independent provider of non-employee workforce management solutions, has formed a strategic alliance with Genesys that provides IQNavigator customers entirely new talent clouds for meeting their non-employee worker needs. The alliance extends the IQNavigator ecosystem of technology and solution partners which is focused on solving complex contingent labor challenges. Genesys is a talent cloud provider that combines SaaS technology and patent pending processes to identify, engage, curate, and connect workers to enterprise workforce demand by using flexible and powerful aggregated sourcing techniques and tools. This optimized sourcing strategy, leveraging talent clouds, accelerates hiring cycle times, reduces cost, and creates a virtual bench to meet customers’ future demand. The true value of Genesys talent clouds stems from the company’s expertise in curating and nurturing talent. IQNavigator customers can immediately leverage this new talent cloud solution for their enterprise hiring needs.
“This alliance is great news for IQNavigator’s customers and MSP partners because Genesys has such strong expertise in the contingent worker space. They provide quicker and more cost effective access to clouds of workers not available from other sources,” said Kevin Poll, Vice President of Strategic Alliances at IQNavigator. “In today’s highly competitive market for the best-of-the-best workers, every company is involved in a war for talent, and that battle is particularly fierce for non-employee workers with specialized skills and with hard-to-find experience.”
“We are excited about teaming up with Genesys because their platform is built specifically for highly-skilled, non-employee workers, and because they represent entirely new talent clouds for our customers to utilize.” he continued.
“Genesys’ candidate, experience-centric model is a powerful weapon for IQNavigator customers competing to hire the best workers for critical projects—helping companies find the right worker timely and economically” said Rick Roberts, Founder and President of Genesys. “This alliance with IQNavigator is a perfect fit, and we look forward to working with the global companies that rely on IQNavigator to achieve their workforce goals.” he continued.
To learn more about this alliance, visit IQNavigator at booth 2647 at the upcoming HR Technology Conference (HR Tech) on October 18-21 in Las Vegas.
 # # #
About IQNavigator
IQNavigator is the leading independent technology provider of Vendor Management System (VMS) software for Global 2000 companies. IQNavigator’s products enable enterprises to intelligently manage and optimize complex services procurement and contingent workforce programs. Since 1999, IQNavigator’s products have been delivering procurement visibility and predictability, helping corporate leaders around the globe increase profitability, mitigate risk and compete more effectively. For more information about IQNavigator, visit http://www.IQNavigator.com .
About Genesys
Genesys is a talent cloud innovator focused on providing exceptional experiences for our curated talent resources as well as enterprise companies seeking accelerated and broader access to an ever-expanding talent spectrum. Genesys is focused on driving efficiency and lowering talent cost over that of traditional sources. By combining a suite of candidate and customer facing technologies with patent pending processes, Genesys creates more efficient pathways between the job seeker and enterprise companies. Functioning as a true solutions partner, Genesys works with companies to deliver strategically aligned talent clouds that represent a new dimension of talent strategy optimization. To learn more about Genesys, visit http://www.genesystalent.com .
